We’re excited to announce that our no-cost, online partner training courses are now available. Become an expert on positioning, pricing and leveraging BigCommerce to grow your revenue with mid-market merchants. September 2016 Newsletter Learn more, sell more: Partner training courses now available After months of preparation, we’re excited to announce that our no-cost, online partner training courses are now available. Become an expert on positioning, pricing and leveraging BigCommerce to grow your revenue with mid-market merchants.
Start with Foundations and work your way through the sales track, tech track or both to become the ultimate sales and development guru:
- Foundations (Required for all partners): Learn the benefits of SaaS and our mid-market position, plus how to jumpstart your partnership.
- Sales 101: Learn how to qualify, close and register deals, plus how our pricing structure works.
- Sales 201: Level up your sales game by learning our differentiators, how to onboard merchants and more.
- Tech 101: Learn our platform inside and out, from the control panel, to payments, shipping and tax.
- Tech 201: Offer merchants the highest level of customization after completing this course on our API.
- Stencil: Learn how to create and customize modern, beautiful stores using our Stencil theming engine. Take your first course <[[https://partners.bigcommerce.com/English/Solutions/training/training_and_enablement.aspx]]> Nurture prospects and close deals with this co-branded campaign in a box As your partner in success, we’re pleased to offer the first in our series of fully baked campaigns in a box. Just add your logo and contact info, then deploy the campaign via your website, email list and social channels.
This campaign covers a key decision that affects merchants’ marketing and dev budgets—SaaS vs. on-premise. It includes the following pieces:
- Ebook - Email campaign - Web copy - Charts & graphics
View and download the campaign collateral » <[[https://partners.bigcommerce.com/English/Solutions/resources/overview.aspx]]> From the blog: 20 expert holiday marketing campaigns to drive sales & revenue If you haven't started preparing your merchants for holiday promotions this year, you're already late. To help you catch up, BigCommerce asked 20 of the top minds in ecommerce for their advice on allocating resources across departments and customer touch points. Join us for a behind-the-scenes best-practices session on how to implement B2B stores on BigCommerce. Our Solutions Engineering team will highlight the most common scenarios where BigCommerce merchants and partners have creatively customized our platform to implement B2B features including bulk order forms and user segmentation.
